Instance.description: Tuning to define a set of cheat sheet hints that appear in the UI. Each item contains: control_elements, a list of elements, TunableVariants that contain either keyframe_icon, a string defining a keyframe on CheatSheetIcon in GuiComponentLibrary.fla, or string_control, a loc string defining the control (e.g. 'Page Up'). item_description: A loc string containing the description fot the control. tests: A set of tests that must be true for the item to be displayed.

TunableList.name: controls
TunableList.description: The entire set of cheat sheet hints. We iterate over this, checking each item against its tests to determine which should be visible.

TunableEnum.description: Set of conditions that, when true, activate this item in the list. EG, TS3_CAMERA_ACTIVE + IN_LIVE_MODE will be visible when the TS3 camera is active and the user is in Live Mode, and invisible if either of those aren't true

TunableList.name: control_elements
TunableList.description: List of elements that define this control item, which may be either names of Keyframes, or strings to display in this line item on the Cheat Sheet

TunableVariant.description: Every Control ElementEither a string that defines a keyframe, or a localized string to display

Tunable.name: keyframe_icon
Tunable.description: When variant is this type, defines the keyframe in CheatSheetIcon in GuiComponentLibrary.fla to display

Tunable.name: string_control
Tunable.description: When variant is this type, specifies the localized string to display in this element

Tunable.name: item_description
Tunable.description: Localized text to display next to to the icon
